blogPost.title: The artists set to represent Russia at the Venice Biennale have pulled out and thousands of others are signing antiwar petitions despite the risks to their careers and the possibility of arrest. https://t.co/c5LjAgtTxk https://t.co/6KgG8g4dG8
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: Ukrainian officials on Monday accused Russian forces of launching a barrage of rockets on a residential neighborhood in Ukraine’s second-largest city, Kharkiv, killing at least nine civilians and injuring dozens of others. https://t.co/WWVPQgdLWT https://t.co/3piPP6leFO

localize.full_text: ウクライナ当局は月曜日、ロシア軍がウクライナ第二の都市ハリコフの住宅街にロケット弾を乱射し、少なくとも9人の市民が死亡、数十人が負傷したと非難した。https://t.co/WWVPQgdLWT https://t.co/3piPP6leFO
乌克兰官员周一指责俄罗斯军队向乌克兰第二大城市哈尔科夫的一个居民区发射了大量火箭弹，造成至少9名平民死亡，数十人受伤。https://t.co/WWVPQgdLWT https://t.co/3piPP6leFO
烏克蘭官員週一指責俄羅斯軍隊向烏克蘭第二大城市哈爾科夫的一個居民區發射了大量火箭彈，造成至少9名平民死亡，數十人受傷。https://t.co/WWVPQgdLWT https://t.co/3piPP6leFO
